name: The Adventure of Hourai High School
summary: Hourai Gakuen no Bouken! (Adventures of Hourai High) is a comedy themed Super Famicom RPG that was based off a play-by-mail pen and paper RPG. The title was developed by Dynamite and published by J-Wing exclusively in Japan on April, 19, 1996. Aeon Genesis released an English translation patch for Hourai Gakuen no Bouken on April 19, 2011.
